titleStmt.title: Examen astronomiæ Carolinæ: T.S. or, a short mathematicall discourse containing, some animadversions upon Mr. Thomas Streetes astronomicall tables of the cœlestial motions wherein his errours and mistakes are clearly detected, and the author hereof justly vindicated from his unjust aspersions. (In an appenidx to the said astronomical treatise.) By Vincent Wing, mathemat.
titleStmt.author: Wing, Vincent, 1619-1668.
